title: Yaaro Yaarukkul Song Lyrics Chennai 28
stanzas:
Yaaro yaarukkul ingu yaaro
yaar nenjai ingu
yaar thanthaaro
vidaiyilaa oru kelvi
(uyir kadhal oru velvi) (2)

kadhal varam naan vaanga
kadai kangal nee veesa
kokkai pola naal thorim
otrai kaalil nindren kanmani.

Yaaro yaarukkul ingu yaaro
yaar nenjai ingu
yaar thanthaaro
vidaiyilaa oru kelvi
(uyir kadhal oru velvi)

oorai vellum thogai nane
unnal indru thotru ponen
kannaal yuththame
seithaai nithamae

oh ho ho ho
nindraai ingu minnal
keetraai
nitham vaangum moochu
kaatraai
unnai soolgiren naan
unnai soolgiren

kaatril vaitha soodam pole
kadhal theerndhu pogaathu
unnai neengi
ushnam thaangi
ennaal vazha aagaathu
anbae vaa...

Yaaro yaarukkul ingu yaaro
yaar nenjai ingu
yaar thanthaaro
vidaiyilaa oru kelvi
(uyir kadhal oru velvi)

unthan aadai kayapodu
ungal veetu kambi kodiiyaai
ennai enninen naan
thavam panninen

ketta ketta vaarthai solli
kitta kitta vanthaai thulli
etti poividu illai
yedho aaividum

aasai vellam
paayum podhu
vanga kadalum
vaaikaal thaan
anbae vaa

Yaaro yaarukkul ingu yaaro
yaar nenjai ingu
yaar thanthaaro
vidaiyilaa oru kelvi
(uyir kadhal oru velvi) (2)

kadhal varam naan vaanga
kadai kangal nee veesa
kokkai pola naal thorim
otrai kaalil nindren kanmani.
